dict.acceptation: 统治；管理；治理；支配（词或短语的形式或用法）；

sent.orig: Govern your passion, otherwise they will govern you.
sent.trans: 感情须克制，勿使控制你。

sent.orig: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself.
sent.trans: 无法统驭事件，那就统驭自己。

sent.orig: A man, who can govern a woman can govern a nation.
sent.trans: 能够管理好女人的男人能够管理好一个国家。

sent.orig: The best of all Govern. ents is that which teaches us to Govern. ourselves.
sent.trans: 最好的政府是教导我们管理自己。

sent.orig: Every boiler should have an efficient thermostat to govern its output.
sent.trans: 每个锅炉应该有一个高效率的自动调温器，以此来抑制它的渗漏。
